original_text: Beloved, when I gave all diligence to write unto you of the common salvation, it was needful for me to write unto you, and exhort you that ye should earnestly contend for the faith which was once delivered unto the saints.
korean_text: 사랑하는 자들아 우리가 일반으로 받은 구원에 관하여 내가 너희에게 편지하려는 생각이 간절하던 차에 성도에게 단번에 주신 믿음의 도를 위하여 힘써 싸우라는 편지로 너희를 권하여야 할 필요를 느꼈노니

sentences.original_text: to write unto you of the common salvation,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게 구원에 대해 쓰려고 할 때에,

sentences.original_text: it was needful for me to write unto you,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 써야 할 필요가 있었으니,

sentences.original_text: that ye should earnestly contend for the faith
which was once delivered unto the saints.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 믿음은 성도들에게 한번 주신 것이니라.
